text: The 1975 European Karate Championships, the 10th edition, was held in Ostend, Belgium from May 5 to 7, 1975. ==Competition== {| |- | Kumite -65 kg | Roger Paschy | Willy Voss | Jacques Bonvin Marc Soli |- | Kumite -75 kg | Billy Higgins | William Millerson | Christian Alifax Wolfgang Ziebart |- | Kumite -80 kg | Eugene Codrington | John Reeberg | Brian Fitkin Dominique Valera |- | Open Kumite | Patrice Belrhiti | Von Johnson | Pasqaule La Cassia Dominique Valera |- |} ===Team=== {| |- |- | Kumite | | | |} ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1976 1975 Category:International sports competitions hosted by Belgium European Karate Championships European championships in 1975 Category:Sport in Ostend Category:Karate competitions in Belgium
title: 1975 European Karate Championships
